home.greeting: Hello! Let's start a new habit?
home.subtitle: Track your progress every day and move towards your goals
motivationalQuotes: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit. ‚Äî Aristotle
Winners are simply losers who got up one more time. ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. ‚Äî Steve Jobs
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. ‚Äî Eleanor Roosevelt
Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm. ‚Äî Winston Churchill
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday. ‚Äî Confucius
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. ‚Äî Confucius
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. ‚Äî Charles R. Swindoll
Don't wait for the perfect moment. Start where you are. ‚Äî Arthur Ashe
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. ‚Äî Nelson Mandela
Your limitation‚Äîit's only your imagination. ‚Äî Roger Bannister
Difficulties often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny. ‚Äî C.S. Lewis
The only way to do the impossible is to believe it is possible. ‚Äî Charles Kingsleigh
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. ‚Äî John D. Rockefeller
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. ‚Äî Chinese Proverb
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out. ‚Äî Robert Collier
It doesn't matter where you came from. All that matters is where you are going. ‚Äî Brian Tracy
The future depends on what you do today. ‚Äî Mahatma Gandhi
Quality is not an act, it is a habit. ‚Äî Aristotle
Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything. ‚Äî George Bernard Shaw
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. ‚Äî Walt Disney
Don't let yesterday take up too much of today. ‚Äî Will Rogers
You must be the change you wish to see in the world. ‚Äî Mahatma Gandhi
Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve. ‚Äî Napoleon Hill
The best time to start was yesterday. The next best time is now. ‚Äî Chinese Proverb
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value. ‚Äî Albert Einstein
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why. ‚Äî Mark Twain
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently. ‚Äî Henry Ford
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. ‚Äî Steve Jobs
If you can dream it, you can do it. ‚Äî Walt Disney
The best way to predict the future is to create it. ‚Äî Peter Drucker
Don't wait. The time will never be just right. ‚Äî Napoleon Hill
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. ‚Äî Lao Tzu
What doesn't kill us makes us stronger. ‚Äî Friedrich Nietzsche
Believe you can and you're halfway there. ‚Äî Theodore Roosevelt
The only way to have a friend is to be one. ‚Äî Ralph Waldo Emerson
Don't find fault, find a remedy. ‚Äî Henry Ford
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear. ‚Äî Mark Twain
Happiness is not having everything, but being satisfied with what you have. ‚Äî Dale Carnegie
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others. ‚Äî Mahatma Gandhi
Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do. ‚Äî John Wooden
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. ‚Äî Steve Jobs
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. ‚Äî Winston Churchill
Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. ‚Äî Steve Jobs
Have no fear of perfection‚Äîyou'll never reach it. ‚Äî Salvador Dali
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday. ‚Äî Confucius
The best time to start was yesterday. The next best time is now. ‚Äî Chinese Proverb
Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm. ‚Äî Winston Churchill
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. ‚Äî Nelson Mandela
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. ‚Äî Charles R. Swindoll
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. ‚Äî Confucius
Your limitation‚Äîit's only your imagination. ‚Äî Roger Bannister
Difficulties often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny. ‚Äî C.S. Lewis
The only way to do the impossible is to believe it is possible. ‚Äî Charles Kingsleigh
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. ‚Äî John D. Rockefeller
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out. ‚Äî Robert Collier
It doesn't matter where you came from. All that matters is where you are going. ‚Äî Brian Tracy

home.noHabits: You don't have any habits yet

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.habitsNotificationsDesc: Configure notifications for each habit separately on the habit details page.

about.title: About
about.appDescription: Application for tracking habits with motivational characters.
about.offlineInfo: You can use it directly in Telegram (Mini App), or install the app on your phone. After installation, it works offline, all data is stored locally.
about.philosophyText1: We believe that getting rid of bad habits is not just a day counter, but a journey with support and motivation. Every day without a bad habit is a small victory worth celebrating.
about.philosophyText2: Our motivational characters are designed so you don't feel alone on this journey. They will be there, supporting you every day, celebrating your achievements and helping you stay on track.
about.advantage1Desc: all your data is stored only on your device. No one but you has access to it.
about.advantage2Desc: the app works without internet. You can use it anytime, anywhere.
about.advantage3Desc: unique characters with different support styles will help you stay on track.
about.advantage4Desc: get rewards for your successes and track progress.
about.advantage5Desc: set reminders via browser or Telegram for each habit separately.
about.advantage6Desc: use the app directly in Telegram without installing additional apps.
about.advantage7Desc: convenient to use on any device: phone, tablet or computer.
about.author: üë®‚Äçüíª About the author
about.authorText1: The app was created with love and care for those who decided to change their lives for the better. We understand how difficult it is to fight bad habits alone, and created this app to make the path to a healthy life more pleasant and motivating.
about.authorText2: If you have suggestions for improving the app or found a bug, we would be happy to hear your feedback!
about.technologiesText: The app is built on modern web technologies:

share.title: Share
share.description: QR code and link for friends
share.shareDescription: Send a link or QR code to friends so they can start tracking their habits too!
share.installTitle: How to install and use offline
share.installDescription: The app can be installed as a PWA and used without internet.
share.installMobileDesc: open browser menu ‚Üí "Add to Home Screen" / "Install app".
share.installDesktopDesc: install icon to the right of the address bar ‚Üí "Install".
share.installOffline: After installation, the app works offline: data is stored locally, no sync required.
share.qrHint: Scan the QR code to open the app

habitForm.telegramSubtitle: Receive reminders even when the app is closed.
habitForm.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this habit? This action cannot be undone.

telegram.title: Telegram notifications
telegram.description: Receive notifications in Telegram even when the app is closed. Works on all devices, including iOS!
telegram.notConfigured: ‚ö†Ô∏è Telegram bot is not configured by administrator. Contact the developer.
telegram.enterChatId: To receive notifications in Telegram, enter your Chat ID below:
telegram.howToGetChatIdSteps:
1. Find your bot in Telegram
2. Send him the command /start
3. Bot will send you your Chat ID
4. Copy Chat ID and paste above
telegram.testHint: Click to check if sending notifications to Telegram works

instructions.title: How to connect Telegram (2 simple steps):
instructions.step1: Enter your Telegram username (e.g.: @ivanov or just ivanov) and click "Connect"
instructions.step2: Open Telegram, find bot @{botUsername} and send him the command /start
instructions.step3: Bot will send you your Chat ID - copy it and paste in the field above
instructions.step4: Done! Notifications will come to Telegram üéâ
instructions.note: üí° Important: Your data is stored only in your browser. No one except you has access to it.

telegram.chatIdNotFound: Chat ID not found in Telegram Mini App. Try: 1) Refresh the page (pull down), 2) Or enter your Chat ID manually in the field above. To find Chat ID, send /start to bot @{botUsername}
telegram.chatIdNotFoundManual: Chat ID not found. Open the app in Telegram Mini App or enter Chat ID manually above.
telegram.messageSent: ‚úÖ Message sent! Open Telegram, find bot @{botUsername} and send him the command /start. Then come back here and enter your Chat ID (bot will send it to you).
telegram.enterUsernameOrChatId: Enter Telegram username (e.g.: @username or username) or Chat ID (number)

stats.title: Overall Statistics
stats.empty: No data to display. Create a habit to see statistics.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.empty: No habits to track achievements. Create a habit to start earning achievements!
